mapper.select: SELECT TDG.id , TDG.nm , TDG.time , TDG.env_yn , TDG.delete_yn , (select COUNT(TDA.door_id) from T_DOOR_ALARM TDA where TDA.dooralram_grp_id = TDG.id) AS door_cnt , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TDA.door_id SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOOR_ALARM TDA WHERE TDA.dooralram_grp_id = TDG.id ) AS door_ids , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( (SELECT A.door_nm FROM T_DOOR A where A.id = TDA.door_id ) SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOOR_ALARM TDA WHERE TDA.dooralram_grp_id= TDG.id ) AS door_nms -- , TDG.created_at -- , TDG.updated_at , DATE_FORMAT(TDG.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at , DATE_FORMAT(TDG.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_at FROM T_DOORALARM_GRP TDG WHERE 1=1 AND TDG.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(TDG.id) AS vCnt FROM T_DOORALARM_GRP TDG WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TDG.nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{nm}, ' ', '')
